short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow cleaning up of meetings for local screen recordings/broadcasting, and mass Google Meet control

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meet Manage (MeetManage) allows you to:
Control/Manipulate Google meets in a variety of ways, whether by shortcut, a Firebase based server, or through a simple SocketIO server*, such as:
Toggle Google Meet's interface
NeverMute
Place an image overlay on  the screen
Automatically place the overlay once a customized number of members are left.
Automatically full screen and/ or hide all call elements on call join.
Change out the background color
Video Only Grid View**

Extended control via SocketIO:
Put a specific individual full screen by name.
Exclude users from the gridview.

*You can create an account on https://galli.dev or create your own server. Further details on extension to server communication will become available here: https://github.com/kgallimore/meetManagePublic

**Video Only grid view is currently only working properly in full screen.

Changelog is located within the extension.

Currently only English is officially supported.
